account.current-password-required: Your current password is required to apply these changes.
account.current-password-required-to-delete-acco: Confirm account deletion with your current password.

errors.cannot-update-other-users-password: Updating other users’ passwords is not allowed.
errors.no-totp-key-active: Two-factor authentication could not be enabled; the setup might have expired.

account.totp-setup-instructions: Scan the QR code with an authenticator app (or copy the secret value) and verify setup by entering the {codeLength}-digit code from the app below.
account.totp-qr-code: QR code for enabling two-factor authentication

warnings.no-change-in-password: New password is the same as the old one.

errors.invalid-credentials: The username or password is incorrect.
errors.invalid-totp: The two-factor authentication code is invalid.
errors.remember-token-secret-mismatch: Possible session hijacking detected. You have been logged out of all sessions as a precaution.
errors.requires-login: Log in to view this page.
errors.requires-no-login: You’re already logged in, you don’t need this page!
errors.session-expired: Session expired. Please log in again.
errors.totp-required: Please enter a two-factor authentication code.
errors.unauthenticated-csrf-token-fetch-failed: There are currently some problems with logging in.

warnings.unused-totp: A two-factor authentication code was supplied, but your account does not have 2FA enabled.

file-upload.select-or-drop-file: Select or drop a file here

errors.user-data-fetch-failed: Could not log in to your account.

errors.unexpected: Could not log in due to an unexpected error.
Could not log out due to an unexpected error.

login-username.too-long: Username can be at most {maxLength, plural, one {# character} other {# characters}} long.

new-username.too-long: New username can be at most {maxLength, plural, one {# character} other {# characters}} long.
new-username.too-short: New username must be at least {minLength, plural, one {# character} other {# characters}} long.

login-password.too-long: Password can be at most {maxLength, plural, one {# character} other {# characters}} long.

current-password.empty: Your current password is required to apply these changes.
current-password.too-long: Current password can be at most {maxLength, plural, one {# character} other {# characters}} long.

new-password.too-long: New password can be at most {maxLength, plural, one {# character} other {# characters}} long.
new-password.too-short: New password must be at least {minLength, plural, one {# character} other {# characters}} long.

totp.empty: Please enter a two-factor authentication code.
totp.invalid: Please enter a {codeLength}-digit two-factor authentication code.

user-icon.invalid-file-type: Selected user icon has an invalid file type.
user-icon.multiple-files: Please select only one file to update your user icon.
user-icon.no-files: No files were selected as the user icon.
user-icon.too-large: Please select a user icon no larger than {maxSizeMB} MB.
user-icon.too-small: User icon should be at least {minDimension}×{minDimension} pixels large.
user-icon.too-tall: User icon will be cropped to a square; the image you selected is too tall.
user-icon.too-wide: User icon will be cropped to a square; the image you selected is too wide.
